description: This file is the main application component for a React web application. It sets up theme toggling between light and dark modes, includes layout components like Sidebar and Topbar, and renders the main routes of the app.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main functional component that manages theme state, applies theme attributes, and composes the application's layout and routing.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle the theme state between 'light' and 'dark'.
